漫言放語: (まんげんほうご) - (yoji) saying whatever one feels; speaking at random; making careless remarks; rambling talk
漬かる: (つかる) - (esp. 漬かる) to be pickled/to be well seasoned; to be submerged/to be soaked; to be totally immersed (in a condition, e.g. laziness)
漬く: (つく) - to be immersed; (漬く only) to be pickled
漬け: (zuke) - pickled (something); pickled in (something), preserved in, dipped in , pickled (something); pickled in (something), preserved in, dipped in; overreliance on (por exemplo, medicamento), excessive use of, addiction to, immersion in, intense involvement in
漬けっ放し: (つけっぱなし) - soaking something; leaving something to soak
漬ける: (つける) - to soak/to seep/to dip in; (漬ける only) to pickle
漬け台: (つけだい) - counter in a sushi restaurant
漬け焼き: (つけやき) - dish broiled in a mix of soy sauce, mirin, etc.; broiling with soy sauce, mirin, etc.
漬け物: (つけもの) - tsukemono; Japanese pickled vegetables
漬け物石: (つけものいし) - weight stone (placed on pickles)
漬け込む: (つけこむ) - to pickle thoroughly; to pickle a large amount
漬る: (ひたる) - to be soaked in/to be flooded/to be submerged; to be immersed in (joy, memories, alcohol, etc.)/to give oneself over to/to bask in
漬台: (つけだい) - counter in a sushi restaurant
漬焼: (つけやき) - dish broiled in a mix of soy sauce, mirin, etc.; broiling with soy sauce, mirin, etc.
漬焼き: (つけやき) - dish broiled in a mix of soy sauce, mirin, etc.; broiling with soy sauce, mirin, etc.
漬物屋: (つけものや) - pickle store; pickle shop; pickle dealer
漬物石: (つけものいし) - weight stone (placed on pickles)
漬込む: (つけこむ) - to pickle thoroughly; to pickle a large amount
漱ぐ: (くちすすぐ) - to gargle; to rinse the mouth
漱石枕流: (そうせきちんりゅう) - (yoji) sore loser stubbornly refusing to admit being wrong and adhering to the far-fetched argument
漲る: (みなぎる) - to be full to the brim/to overflow/to swell (e.g. river full of water); to be filled with (emotion, e.g. energy, passion, ardor)/to be (brim) full of/to pervade (e.g. atmosphere with emotion)
漸々: (ぜんぜん) - gradually/by degrees; the sight of a tall soaring rock; crying/weeping
漸う: (ようよう) - finally; barely/only just; gradually
漸く: (youyaku) - finalmente, por fim; mal, por pouco, quase não, apenas, só agora; gradualmente, pouco a pouco, aos poucos
漸て: (やがて) - before long/soon; almost/nearly; finally/in the end/eventually
漸漸: (ぜんぜん) - gradually/by degrees; the sight of a tall soaring rock; crying/weeping
漸落市況: (ぜんらくしきょう) - (yoji) sagging market
漸近的自由: (ぜんきんてきじゆう) - asymptotic freedom
漸進主義: (ぜんしんしゅぎ) - (yoji) gradualism; slow-and-steady policy
漿を乞いて酒を得る: (しょうをこいてさけをうる) - to get more than one requests; to beg for water and receive wine
漿果: (しょうか) - moist, pulpy fruit (i.e. tomato, grape, berry)
漿液: (しょうえき) - juice; sap; blood serum
潅ぐ: (そそぐ) - to pour (into)/to fill; to sprinkle on from above/to shed (e.g. tears); to concentrate one's spirit (strength, attention) on; to fall onto (of rain, snow)
潅漑用水: (かんがいようすい) - irrigation water
潑剌: (はつらつ) - lively; vigorous; sprightly; vivid
潑溂: (はつらつ) - lively; vigorous; sprightly; vivid
潔い: (いさぎよい) - manly/sportsmanlike/gracious/gallant/resolute/brave; pure (heart, actions, etc.)/upright/blameless; unsullied (e.g. scenery or object)/pure/clean
潔しとしない: (いさぎよしとしない) - find it against one's conscience (to do); too proud (to do)
潔しとせず: (いさぎよしとせず) - find it against one's conscience (to do); too proud (to do)
潔よい: (いさぎよい) - manly/sportsmanlike/gracious/gallant/resolute/brave; pure (heart, actions, etc.)/upright/blameless; unsullied (e.g. scenery or object)/pure/clean
潔癖性: (けっぺきしょう) - obsession with cleanliness; fastidiousness
潔癖症: (けっぺきしょう) - fastidiousness/fussiness about cleanliness, etc.; clean-freak
潔白: (けっぱく) - innocence (i.e. not guilty); purity; uprightness
潜く: (かづく) - to be underwater from the neck down/to collect shells, seaweed, etc. by diving under the water; to force something under the surface of the water
潜む: (hisomu) - espreitar, estar escondido, estar oculto, permanecer dormente, estar latente
潜める: (ひそめる) - to hide/to conceal; to lower volume (of a sound or one's voice) so as not to be heard; to become quiet and inconspicuous
潜らせる: (くぐらせる) - to make something pass through (esp. in cooking); to dip something (into)
潜り戸: (くぐりど) - side door; side gate
潜り抜ける: (くぐりぬける) - to go through/to pass through; to struggle through/to get through (difficulties, danger, etc.)/to escape (through the cordon)/to evade (the law)
潜り込む: (もぐりこむ) - to slip into/to crawl into (under)/to conceal oneself (under); to sneak into/to infiltrate
潜る: (むぐる) - to dive (into or under water); to get under/to get into/to get in/to creep into/to crawl under/to bury oneself/to burrow into/to dig oneself into/to snuggle under; to hide oneself (esp. from the government)/to conceal oneself/to go underground
潜んでいる力: (ひそんでいるちから) - potentiality; latent power
